products.title: Prime Arcadia
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 2438mm min drop: 250mm max drop: 2438mm fabric joins: blinds with a width and drop greater than 1730mm may be joined. Dependant on the fabric patterns will be matched. Fabric composition: polyester tube: robust aluminium tube control: sidewinder control only guarantee: 12 months fittings: included buy made to measure prime arcadia budget roller blinds from soeasy blinds.

products.title: Splash Arcadia
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm min drop: 200mm max drop: 2913mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open and close the blind, beaded chain to tilt louvres. Controls can be positioned on the left or right. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.

products.title: Splash Arcadia
products.description: Min width: 330mm max width: 1400mm min drop: 165mm max drop: 1800mm fabric composition: polyester guarantee: 12 months controls: tensioned system, move bottom bar to raise/lower blind. Buy made to measure splash arcadia perfect fit roller blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality perfect fit roller blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery.

products.title: Arcadia Chartreuse
products.description: Min width: 350mm max width: 1340mm (with join 2500mm) min drop: 400mm max drop: 2500mm fabric composition: 25% polyester / 75% cotton guarantee: 12 months controls: sidewinder control. Fabric lining: fully lined as standard, blackout and interlining available. Fixings: fixing brackets included. Headrail: robust aluminium headrail, 40mm wide x 40mm deep. Finish: fabric attached to headrail with velcro.
